comment: /**  * Set the data type of the message.  *  * @param type data type  */
code: /**  * Set the data type of the message.  *  * @param type data type  */ void setDataType(DataType type).

comment: /**  * Get the data type of the message.  *  * @return data type  */
code: /**  * Get the data type of the message.  *  * @return data type  */ DataType getDataType().

comment: /**  * Whether any data type has been configured  */
code: /**  * Whether any data type has been configured  */ boolean hasDataType().

comment: /**  * Set the message body with data type.  *  * @param body message body  * @param type data type  */
code: /**  * Set the message body with data type.  *  * @param body message body  * @param type data type  */ void setBody(Object body, DataType type).
